title: VISA GIFT CARD FAIL PURCHASE 24 HOUR WAIT
body:
So i recently bought this visa gift card and it doesn't seem to work. when i apply the right information i submit it and it goes to the error saying. "number of tries exceeded please try again in 24 HOURS!" PLEASE HELP ME!
by the way i am in australia and bought the card at woolowrhts i came here because the client for oceania doesnt have any reponses

replies.body: Sometimes they have a 12 hour activation timer

From my understanding, the card should work so I'm not sure what's going on.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so billing team can take a look to see what's up.  We'll respond as soon as we can and help out!
